page.title: 12 Beccles News!
page.content: CHAOS! One inch of rain fell in one hour on Midsummer Day!Fredericks Rd was 1 foot deep,Kilbrack,Meadow Way,Common Lane and Ingate were flooded.Lightening struck in Common Lane. ------ The total Donations so far for the James Paget Hospital CT scanner appeal has reached $227,995. ------ An anonymous donor has given $17,000 to Beccles Parish Church Undercroft Appeal for which $140,000 is needed to complete phase two. ------ A maple tree was planted by Mrs P. Cullingford at the Brownie and Guide HQ to mark the 75th anniversary of the Guiding Movement.
